ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] UOvsEQ
ygData.msgSnippet: It is completely up to you. The view is hot-swappable, 1st, 3rd, isometric, parametric, top down, you pick the angle :) ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
It is completely up to you. The view is hot-swappable, 1st, 3rd, isometric,
parametric, top down, you pick the angle :)


----- Original Message -----
From: <Walker5000@...>
To: <EverQuest@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 8:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] UOvsEQ
